Description: Extracting functional and non-functional requirements from text
Identifying entities (e.g., actors, objects) in requirement text
Identifying parts of speech (e.g., nouns, verbs) in requirement text
Analyzing grammatical structure of requirement text
Identifying underlying themes in requirement text
Classifying requirements into categories (e.g., functional, non-functional)
Retrieving relevant requirements from large datasets
Prioritizing requirements based on NLP analysis
Calculating complexity metrics (e.g., cyclomatic complexity) for requirements
Detecting ambiguous requirements using NLP analysis
